abstract: Restaurant Brands International reports that Burger King and Tim Hortons chains saw most robust same-stores sales performance in years in first quarter.
lead_paragraph: Sales at Tim Hortons open for 13 months or longer rose 5.3 percent during the quarter, the company said, driven by menu items like a new steak and cheese panini.

headline.main: Burger King and Tim Hortons Post Best Sales Figures in Years
headline.print_headline: Burger King and Tim Hortons Post Best Sales Figures in Years

snippet: Sales at Tim Hortons open for 13 months or longer rose 5.3 percent during the quarter, the company said, driven by menu items like a new steak and cheese panini.
